short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search many popular websites for your highlighted words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to search many popular websites for the words you have highlighted on any website. No more copy pasting.

Talking to your friend about going out and they say a place youve never heard of before? Highlight the place, right click and search for it on Google Maps.

Reading an article and a spot product you are interested in? Right click and search amazon (all amazon regions available).

Sites included: 
YouTube
Wikipedia
Reddit
Google Maps
Facebook
Twitter
Amazon (US, UK, CA, DE, FR, JP, BR, AT, IT, ES, CN, MX, AU, NL, IN)
Netflix
IMDB
GitHub
